detaileddescription.para: No layout
Center objects
Column left align
Column middle align
Column right align
Row top align
Row middle align
Row bottom align
Put as many object as possible in row and begin a new row
Align same-sized object into a grid
Container layout options
Do not change the size automatically
Shrink wrap around the children
Align the size to the parent's edge
Align the size to the parent's edge first but if there is an object out of it then get larger
How to resize the container around the children.

Create a container objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new container
copy
pointer to a container object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created container

Set a layout on a container
cont
pointer to a container object
layout
a layout from 'lv_cont_layout_t'

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *cont, lv_fit_t left, lv_fit_t right, lv_fit_t top, lv_fit_t bottom)
memberdef.name: lv_cont_set_fit4

detaileddescription.para:
Set the fit policy in all 4 directions separately. It tell how to change the container's size automatically.
cont
pointer to a container object
left
left fit policy from lv_fit_t
right
right fit policy from lv_fit_t
top
top fit policy from lv_fit_t
bottom
bottom fit policy from lv_fit_t

Set the fit policy horizontally and vertically separately. It tells how to change the container's size automatically.
cont
pointer to a container object
hor
horizontal fit policy from lv_fit_t
ver
vertical fit policy from lv_fit_t

Set the fit policy in all 4 direction at once. It tells how to change the container's size automatically.
cont
pointer to a container object
fit
fit policy from lv_fit_t

Set the style of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
type
which style should be set (can be only LV_CONT_STYLE_MAIN)
style
pointer to the new style

Get the layout of a container
cont
pointer to container object
the layout from 'lv_cont_layout_t'

Get left fit mode of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get right fit mode of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get top fit mode of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get bottom fit mode of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
an element of lv_fit_t

Get the style of a container
cont
pointer to a container object
type
which style should be get (can be only LV_CONT_STYLE_MAIN)
pointer to the container's style
